{"id":693544457,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1651737369,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"56 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/693544457/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"30.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findUnsortedSubarray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<pair<int,int> > info;\n        for(int index = 0; index < nums.size(); index++) {\n            info.push_back({nums[index], index});\n        }\n        sort(info.begin(), info.end());\n        int leftMin = nums.size();\n        int rightMax = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            pair<int,int> currInfo = info[i];\n            if(currInfo.second != i) {\n                leftMin = min(leftMin, currInfo.second);\n                rightMax = max(rightMax, i);\n            }\n        }\n        if(leftMin <= rightMax) {\n            return rightMax - leftMin + 1;\n        }\n        return 0;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
